creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: male figure with PL hand to chin; stomach protrudes to a point; 2 horns protrude from top of head; hair comprised of small wooden dowel-like objects; dark brown pigment covers body; white pigment on hands, mouth, eyes and genitals
title: House Spirit Figure
